titles.title: Ask in faith, the Name of Jesus

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“Ask in faith,” ’tis just the asking, In a faith that dares to stand, Full of joyful expectation, With an open, outstretched hand.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“Ask in faith,” for God is waiting For thy faith-filled, earnest prayer. Faith delights Him; faith can touch Him, Every moment, everywhere.{/lang-eng}
